TypeSignature.Value: .class public sealed beforefieldinit BINDPTR extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Contains a pointer to a bound-to <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCDESC"> structure, <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.VARDESC> structure, or an `ITypeComp` interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about the `BINDPTR` type, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

Docs.summary: Represents a pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.FUNCDESC"> structure.
Represents a pointer to an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeComp"> interface.
Represents a pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.VARDESC"> structure.
